a data frame with y and x in a sigmoidal relationship (with error and a covariate z)

Source: R/data.R
nonlindat.Rd

a data frame with y and x in a sigmoidal relationship (with error and a covariate z)

Usage

nonlindat

Format

data.frame

Examples

data(nonlindat)
plot(y~x, data=nonlindat, col=z+1, pch=19)
